page.title: 18Young Thoughts of Moy
page.content: I love living in Moy. We came because we didn't like the town. I want to stay in Moy or go to Edinburgh. I would like to be a hairdresser. I like Moy because of the peace and freedom. I like walking in the woods and going to the Loch for picnics. We take our swimming costumes. _ I like living in Moy because it is peacefull. When I grow up I would like to be a Film Star. I would have to leave Moy. _ I love living in Moy. I would like to be a farmer on Moy Farm. I am glad I would not have to leave Moy for this job. I do not want to leave Moy ever. The reasons for not leaving are the peace and trees to climb, the freedom and the forest walks. I love the countryside.
